about_the_game:
The current version contains 24 characters, 40+weapons, and 40+enemies. Have a great time~

Cat Good Work is a simple bullet screen shooting Rogue game that can be operated with one hand. Here, you can:
1. Simply press the W, A, S, D, and E buttons to enjoy the game, with fully automatic aiming and no additional operation required.
2. Choose from multiple adorable characters such as cats, rabbits, bears, etc., each with unique characteristics.
3. 190+secret techniques to choose from, with rich strategies.
4. Challenge multiple levels of difficulty to find the most suitable partner's secret skills and attribute combinations.
5. Dozens of highly strategic enemies will appear in the trial, and it is not necessary to completely eliminate them to survive and pass. However, powerful enemies will have abundant drops, so it is necessary to defeat them with all your strength.
6. After recruiting suitable partners, clicking on a partner has a chance to gain reinforcement. If you have nothing to do, just communicate more with your partners! If your partner crosses their hips and refuses, then don't click again.
7. There are various strange weapons and magic to choose from.
8. After upgrading the character, you will receive random selectable rewards. In the early stages, try to choose new weapons. A powerful new weapon can reduce a lot of difficulty.
9. The funny golden egg will have a small chance of refreshing, so don't miss it if you encounter it, as it will drop a large amount of resources.

The current version contains 24 characters, 40+weapons, and 40+enemies. Have a great time~

Cat Good Work is a simple bullet screen shooting Rogue game that can be operated with one hand. Here, you can:
1. Simply press the W, A, S, D, and E buttons to enjoy the game, with fully automatic aiming and no additional operation required.
2. Choose from multiple adorable characters such as cats, rabbits, bears, etc., each with unique characteristics.
3. 190+secret techniques to choose from, with rich strategies.
4. Challenge multiple levels of difficulty to find the most suitable partner's secret skills and attribute combinations.
5. Dozens of highly strategic enemies will appear in the trial, and it is not necessary to completely eliminate them to survive and pass. However, powerful enemies will have abundant drops, so it is necessary to defeat them with all your strength.
6. After recruiting suitable partners, clicking on a partner has a chance to gain reinforcement. If you have nothing to do, just communicate more with your partners! If your partner crosses their hips and refuses, then don't click again.
7. There are various strange weapons and magic to choose from.
8. After upgrading the character, you will receive random selectable rewards. In the early stages, try to choose new weapons. A powerful new weapon can reduce a lot of difficulty.
9. The funny golden egg will have a small chance of refreshing, so don't miss it if you encounter it, as it will drop a large amount of resources.
name: Cat Good Work

subs.option_text: 猫咪干得好 Cat Good Work - $2.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cat Good Work is a simple bullet shooting Rogue game that can be operated with one hand. As the most beautiful kitten in the Cat Village, you need to recruit multiple partners and combine their unique skills and attributes to pass the most difficult trials in the village.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain
